data.name: PPX Customer Info (cached)
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal input_format input_format_options}}
    <setHeader name="ACCOUNT_NUMBER">
        <simple>
            {{account_number}}
        </simple>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="OUTPUT_FIELD_NAME">
        <constant>
            {{output_field_name}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="OUTPUT_FIELD_SCOPE">
        <constant>
            {{output_field_scope}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="URL">
        <constant>
            {{url}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="USER">
        <constant>
            {{user}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="PASSWORD">
        <constant>
            {{password}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    <process ref="customerInfoManager"/>
    {{applyMarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
